author: Simon Difford
description: Champagne is made to go with strawberries.
name: Jayne Mansfield
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
30 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker
Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass
